title: OUC Grand Finals on the 30th of August
body:
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/002971_lol_luna_park_card3_1280x720px_02.jpg?itok=KJutZcky

After a few weeks of epic games, the top two teams have been decided! 

the University of Auckland will play against the University of New South Wales live at the Riot Sydney studio, check out the brackets so far [here.](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/oceanic-university-championship-playoffs)

The games will be best of 5 and will be streamed on our [twitch channel](http://www.twitch.tv/riotgamesoceania). Games start at 2pm AEST on the 30th of August.
